details: TIER II A heavy-duty jacket or full kevlar.
TIER II Equipped with Adrenachrome_HST auto-injector that fires if the wearer is Battered.
TIER III +2DR on Agility tests including Defense. Equipped with Adrenachrome_HST auto-injector that fires if the wearer is Battered.

TIER IV Equipped with multiple customizable injectors, jump jets, motorized joints and more. +4DR on Agility tests. Defense is +2DR, Toughness and Strength are −2DR. Can jump 4× regular height and length.
